Implement/extend the blur method, if you want to do something special when the focus is lost.
Extend the doDrag method, if you want to do something special when the user is performing a dragging event.
Just a passthrough to HWindowControl.doDrag
Extend the endDrag method, if you want to do something special when the user ends a dragging event.
Just a passthrough to HWindowControl.endDrag
Implement/extend the focus method, if you want to do something special when the focus is gained.
Implement/extend this if you want to do something special when the control gets activated.
Implement/extend the keyDown method, if you want to do something special when a key is pressed down and the component is active.
Implement/extend the keyUp method, if you want to do something special when a key is released and the component is active.
Implement/extend this if you want to do something special when the control loses its active status.
Makes sure that the focus is removed from the text field when another component is activated.
Implement/extend the mouseDown method, if you want to do something special when the mouse button is pressed down and the component instance has focus.
Performs tab selection/highlights.
Implement/extend the mouseUp method, if you want to do something special when the mouse button is released and the component instance has focus.
Implement/extend the mouseWheel method, if you want to do something special when the mouse wheel is used and the component instance has focus.
Extend the onAnimationCancel method, if you want to do something special when an animation on this view gets cancelled.
Extend the onAnimationEnd method, if you want to do something special when an animation on this view is finished.
Extend the onAnimationStart method, if you want to do something special when this view starts animating.
Extend the onDrop method, if you want to do something special when the user is performing a drop event.
Extend the onHoverEnd method, if you want to do something special when a dragged component instance is dragged from a droppable component instance.
Extend the onHoverStart method, if you want to do something special when a dragged component instance is dragged over a droppable component instance.
Extend this method, if you are going to perform regular actions in a app.
Save typed in or pasted text into the member variable.
Extend the startDrag method, if you want to do something special when the user starts a dragging event.
Just a passthrough to HWindowControl.startDrag
